users.name: Platform Administrator
users.description: Full system access - Vetting, Moderation, Reports, Audit Trail, User Management

users.name: NEOM Development Authority
users.description: Beneficiary - Creates MegaProjects, creates ServiceRequests, reviews proposals, accepts service offers. Demonstrates MegaProject with multiple contract types.

users.name: Saudi Real Estate Company
users.description: Beneficiary - Creates standalone Projects, manages project lifecycle. Demonstrates PROJECT_CONTRACT workflow.

users.name: Alpha Construction Group
users.description: Vendor - Executes MegaProject contracts, manages sub-contractors, creates SubContracts. Demonstrates MEGA_PROJECT_CONTRACT and SUB_CONTRACT relationships.

users.name: Beta Infrastructure Ltd
users.description: Vendor - Executes standalone Project contracts. Demonstrates PROJECT_CONTRACT workflow.

users.name: BIM Solutions Co
users.description: Service Provider - Provides BIM coordination services. Responds to ServiceRequests, never bids on Projects. Demonstrates SERVICE_CONTRACT workflow.

users.name: Quality Assurance Services
users.description: Service Provider - Provides QA/QC inspection services. Responds to ServiceRequests, demonstrates SERVICE_CONTRACT workflow.

users.name: Project Planning Experts
users.description: Service Provider - Provides project planning and scheduling services. Responds to ServiceRequests from Vendors.

users.name: Green Building Consultants
users.description: Consultant - Provides sustainability advisory services. Demonstrates ADVISORY_CONTRACT workflow.

users.name: MEP Specialists LLC
users.description: SubContractor - Works under Vendors only, never directly with Beneficiaries. Demonstrates SUB_CONTRACT workflow with Vendor Alpha.

users.name: Steel Fabrication Co
users.description: SubContractor - Works under Vendors only, never directly with Beneficiaries. Demonstrates SUB_CONTRACT workflow with Vendor Alpha.
